messages.content: I'd like to order the Bruschetta alla Romana.
Certainly! The Bruschetta alla Romana is available for 3,600 Rwf.

description: Tomato, onion, basil, garlic and olive oil

messages.content: What starters do you have?
We have options like the Bowl of Crispy Young Squid and Filini Chef’s Salad.

description: Marjoram aioli and roasted garlic focaccia

messages.content: Do you have any salads?
Yes, we have the Filini Chef’s Salad for 8,500 Rwf.

description: Mixed green salad with avocado, cherry, chicken, and lemon emulsion

messages.content: Can I get the Classico Minestrone Soup?
Certainly! The Classico Minestrone Soup served with Focaccia is available for 6,500 Rwf.

item_name: Classico Minestrone Soup served with Focaccia
description: Traditional Italian vegetable soup with pasta

messages.content: I'd like the Risotto Parmigiana.
Sure! The Risotto Parmigiana is 15,500 Rwf.

description: Forest mushroom, truffle oil, and parmesan cheese

messages.content: What are your options under Planks?
We offer Tagliere Toscano and Formaggi Misti.

description: Italian cold cuts, grilled focaccia, olives, tomato tapenade

messages.content: Do you have a cheese platter?
Yes, we have the Formaggi Misti for 15,000 Rwf.

description: Imported Italian cheese, carta di musica, walnuts, and honey

messages.content: I'd like a seafood pasta.
You might enjoy the Spaghetti con Calamari e Gamberi for 12,500 Rwf.

description: Spaghetti with calamari, shrimps, garlic, white wine, and parsley

messages.content: What pasta dishes do you recommend?
Our Farfalle al Salmone is highly recommended, priced at 14,000 Rwf.

description: Smoked salmon tossed with chopped onion, white wine, and crushed black pepper in contemporary pink sauce

messages.content: Do you serve Bolognese?
Yes, we have Tagliatelle Bolognese for 11,000 Rwf.

description: A rich and properly simmered Bolognese made of beef

messages.content: Do you have any gnocchi dishes?
Yes, the Gnocchi di Patate al Granchio is available for 16,000 Rwf.

description: Homemade potato dumplings with crab meat, cherry tomatoes, and broad beans

messages.content: Can I order the Lasagna al Forno?
Certainly! It's available for 13,500 Rwf.

description: Fine layers of fresh pasta sheets, beef meat ragu, and Parmesan béchamel

messages.content: What pizzas do you offer?
We have Pollo, Margherita, Salami, Pizza Tonno e Cipolle, and Funghi pizzas.

description: Tomatoes, mozzarella, sautéed chicken, fresh basil, drizzled with olive oil

messages.content: Do you have a vegetarian pizza?
Yes, our Margherita pizza is vegetarian and is priced at 9,500 Rwf.

description: Tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil

messages.content: I'd like the Salami pizza.
Certainly! The Salami pizza is available for 12,000 Rwf.

description: Tomatoes, mozzarella, and Salami Milano

messages.content: What is on the Pizza Tonno e Cipolle?
It includes tomatoes, mozzarella, canned tuna, onion, and chili flakes, priced at 11,500 Rwf.

description: Tomatoes, mozzarella, canned tuna, onion, chili flakes

messages.content: Tell me about the Funghi pizza.
The Funghi pizza has tomatoes, mozzarella, white button and forest mushrooms, Taleggio cheese, and is priced at 11,800 Rwf.

description: Tomatoes, mozzarella, white button and forest mushrooms, Taleggio cheese

messages.content: What mains do you recommend?
Our Tilapia from Lake Kivu and Filetto di Salmone are popular choices.

description: Fresh fillet of tilapia, pan-fried, baked onion, and gremolata

messages.content: I'd like the Filetto di Salmone.
Certainly! It's available for 25,000 Rwf.

description: Served with tagliatelle of grilled zucchini, cherry tomatoes, and rocket

messages.content: Do you have beef dishes?
Yes, we have the Filetto di Manzo al Pepe Verde for 17,000 Rwf.

item_name: Filetto di Manzo al Pepe Verde
description: Beef fillet with green peppercorn sauce, snow peas, and vegetable beef jus

messages.content: What's Chicken Diavola?
Tender pieces of chicken marinated in garlic, chili, and thyme olive oil, priced at 13,000 Rwf.

description: Tender pieces of chicken marinated in garlic, chili, and thyme olive oil

messages.content: Tell me about the Rack of Lamb.
It's scented with Mediterranean herbs, served with seasonal vegetables, new potatoes, red wine demi-glace, priced at 29,000 Rwf.

description: Scented with Mediterranean herbs, seasonal vegetables, new potatoes, red wine demi-glace

messages.content: What desserts do you have?
We offer Torte al Cioccolato, Tiramisu, Affogato, Italian Artisan Ice Cream, and Macedonia di Frutta.

description: Creamy chocolate cake with coffee, Amarula, and sabayon

messages.content: I'd like the Tiramisu.
Certainly! The Tiramisu is available for 6,800 Rwf.

description: Classic coffee tiramisu

messages.content: Do you have ice cream?
Yes, we have Italian Artisan Ice Cream, 3 scoops for 5,600 Rwf.

description: 3 scoops of ice cream flavors of the day

messages.content: What's in the Macedonia di Frutta?
It's a fresh fruit salad in spiced syrup, served with lemon and mint sorbet, priced at 5,600 Rwf.

description: Fresh fruit salad in spiced syrup, served with lemon and mint sorbet
